sentences.en: A Scion Drives Toyota Back To Basics.
sentences.cn: 丰田新总裁继承祖业回归本源应对危机.

sentences.en: And the Scion holds its history.
sentences.cn: 而司祭盎保存着它的历史.

sentences.en: Grafting of root stocks with named scion cultivars was well understood by the Romans.
sentences.cn: 用已经命名的栽培品种稼接在砧木上这种技术已经为罗马人所熟知.

sentences.en: It requires a scion with several bud zornidbuds on it.
sentences.cn: 这要求接穗说有很多芽.

sentences.en: It requires a scion with several buds on it.
sentences.cn: 它需要有数处萌芽的幼芽.

sentences.en: Nabokov was the scion of an aristocratic family.
sentences.cn: 纳博科夫曾是一位贵族家庭的小少爷。

sentences.en: The branch or bud that is grafted is called a scion.
sentences.cn: 这个嫁接的支条和嫩芽叫做接穗.

sentences.en: The branch or bud that is grafted is called the scion.
sentences.cn: 这些被嫁接的枝和芽被称之为接穗.

sentences.en: The scion is then securely a cut on the rootstock.
sentences.cn: 然后幼芽被妥善的接到砧木的切割处.

sentences.en: The scion is then securely placed a cut on the rootstock.
sentences.cn: 然后将其安全地放到根茎的切口处.

sentences.en: The scion is then securely placed into a cut on the rootstock.
sentences.cn: 然后将接穗插入砧木切口紧密贴合.

sentences.en: The scion is then securely placed into the cut root stock.
sentences.cn: 然后接穗就安全的放入砧木的切口中.

sentences.en: The scion supplies only aerial parts to the GRAFT.
sentences.cn: 接穗仅作为嫁接植物的“天线”部分.

sentences.en: This Scion belongs to Natla ; Face it, you got no business here.
sentences.cn: 祭司盎是属于纳特拉的.

sentences.en: You both spent years searching for the Scion of Atlantis.
sentences.cn: 你们俩花费了好几年搜寻亚特兰蒂斯的司祭盎.

sentences.en: Yours are going to cost you both pieces of the Scion.
sentences.cn: 你要付出的代价就是两片司祭盎.

trans.tran_cn: 接穗，幼枝，（尤指富家）子孙
trans.tran_en: a young member of a famous or important family
